name: Seeded Lava - 250ml
description:
Ranked 8th out of 106 entries at the Lousiana Hot Sauce Festival Sauce Competition October 2013

Lava - Hot and Red! An awesome blend of capsicum, garlic, onion and chilli that is your 'go to' sauce when you just want heat and acidity that a good sauce delivers.  No standout flavours like the rest of the range, just a nice balance of heat and flavor.  At the top end of the 'everyday person' heat scale, this pushes the pain threshold just a little bit, but for most it's bareable.  For some, it might just be a little too hot!  Asian and Mexican dishes scream out for this sauce.

name: Smoke & Fire - 250ml
description: You know what they say.  "Where there's smoke......."  In this case, it's on purpose.  A little more than 'subtle' the smoke flavor comes from a liquid smoke from Misty Gully Smokehouse (North East Victoria, Australia), and is paired with Smoked Salt from the Murray Darling Basin, along with a Black Olive Paste out of Yackandandah (North East Victoria, Australia)  They all work to create a sauce rich in colour and character.  A perfect sauce for ribs, wings and burgers, but don't limit it to those, put it on the table and use it on everything!

name: Cajed Heat - 250ml
description:
Ranked 7th out of 106 entries at the Lousiana Hot Sauce Festival Sauce Competition October 2013

Love your Cajun food? Mexican? Anything Southern American?  This one delivers an awesome earthy spice blend that for some says "Taco's, Burrito's", for others brings back memories of travelling around South America.  For us it's just a beautiful balance between spices, acidity and heat that works extremely well with anything off the barbeque.  Beef, Lamb, Chicken.   A tablespoon of this mixed with burger mince injects a savoury spice note to the mince with hardly any effort.  Cook your steak and once you've turned it for the last time, a teaspoon of sauce on the top, let the sauce heat up and the aroma and flavors intensify just a little more.  Welcome summer, welcome barbeque sauce replacement.

name: MINT - Sweet Sweet Lovin' Mint - 250ml
description: Love your lamb roast?  Like a little chilli and a lot of MINT?  Here's a sauce that will turn Nanna's lamb roast into a roast with attitude.  Slow cook the lamb, remove the bone, strip apart the beatiful tender lamb, drizzle Sweet Sweet Lovin' MINT, toss through the meat and back in the oven uncovered for 5-10 minutes (are you hungry yet?). Add to your Vietnamese style dishes or use it to replace your every day sweet chilli sauce.  Works a treat with a roast vegetable salad, or try marinating fetta in it for a week.

name: GINGER - Sweet Sweet Lovin' Ginger - 250ml
description: Sweet Chilli plus Ginger equals a refreshing sweet chilli sauce that is packed full of Ginger.  Whilst ginger is reknowned to be good for you, it works extremely well with chicken and seafood.  Stiry Fry your prawns, chicken (and even beef).  Add it to your Asian style salads, dip your Yum Cha or add it to your Sushi Rolls.  Marinate chicken or fish and experience the tenderness and intense flavors. Very Very versatile.

name: LIME - Sweet Sweet Lovin' LIME - 250ml
description: Sweet Sweet Lovin' LIME is packed with LIME! Zest, Juice, and Kaffir Lime Leaf.  Dipping Sauce, Marinade, Salad Dressing or Stir Fry addition.  Imagine a cold crunchy green tossed salad with a drizzle of our Sweet LIME and you're in fresh salad heaven.  Thai beef salad, chicken or beef stirfry, or with sour cream for a dipping sauce experience you'll go back for again and again.

name: The Garlic Source - 250ml
description: The Garlic Source!!  Got Garlic?  Absolutely!  Many Many kilo's of roasted GARLIC to into this recipe.  We partly steam / roast the garlic and once the juices start rising out of the cloves, we let the oven caremelise all the sugars that GARLIC contains.  The result is a slighly sweet, nutty roasted garlic flavour that just says "Italian Food"!  Pizza and Pasta call out for this sauce.  Lamb kebabs and The GARLIC Source = flavor harmony.  A delicate flavor that only a little touch of chilli can complement. Pizza base, The Garlic Source, Cheese, oven 10 minutes, instant Garlic Pizza.  We do all the hard work so you don't have to.

name: Haba Nice Day - Premium - 150ml
description:
Ranked 14th out of 106 entries at the Lousiana Hot Sauce Festival Sauce Competition October 2013

Our Premium Range is just that, our top of the line, super hot, super tasty, super packed to the brim with fresh spicy goodness.
If you're just not sure, you probably shouldn't!  If you know you can, you definitely should.
This packs a punch, but it's not over the top.  We've struck the balance pretty well, with the flavor and the heat, suspended nicely on the balance beam.   Habanero's deliver the flavor and the heat and are unmistakable in this sauce.   Add to cooking (stir fries), Asian and Mexican dishes, or turn your 'meat and 3 veg' into an experience that you won't forget.
